directions: Cream together peanut butter, mascarpone cheese, honey, vanilla and salt until well blended. Stir in chocolate chips.
Serve with Snack Factory(R) Pretzel Crisps(R) for dipping.
ingredients: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
title: Delightful Peanut Butter Dip
